name: Nuit Blanche
description:
You're in a strange place, you don't know what to do, but there's a Red Door in front of you...

Made with Unreal Engine 4 in the last 15 hours of the Ludum Dare #35 jam.

Credits

Tomavatars: Sound Design, Graphics, Game Design, Code

MatLab: Game Design, Code, 3D (lol)
